snippet: John Hansen, a former rock disc jockey, now hosts a Sunday N.F.L. show on DirecTV and a daily spot on a Sirius XM channel.
lead_paragraph: John Hansen, a former rock disc jockey, now hosts a Sunday N.F.L. show on DirecTV and a daily spot on a Sirius XM channel.

headline.main: Fantasy Football Stats Guru Placed Day Job on Waivers
headline.print_headline: Stats Guru Placed Day Job On Waivers
